STATE
v.
ALLEN. No. COA07-1528. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed July 15, 2008. Certification Date August 4, 2008. Appeal from Wake (05CRS35195, 05CRS35196, 05CRS35197, 05CRS37635, 05CRS65514, 05CRS65515, 05CRS65516, 05CRS65517, 05CRS65518, 05CRS65519).
